Welcome to Outpost Luna. Current records show you have a month left on tour til your return to Earth. \nAutonomous Mining Rover Alpha 01 (AMR Alpha 1) reported a problem. Assist the rover.
Walk to Autonomous Mining Rover Alpha 01
Drive manned rover to AMR Alpha 01

You go to get your spacesuit and notice a slight tear on the left arm fabric. You won\'t survive on out on the surface with the tear. There is some ducktape nearby that could be used to patch the tear temporarily. Else you will have to wait til a new arm piece can be fabricated. Which will take a day. The company really needs the AMR Alpha 01 operational as soon as possible though
Temporarily patch the tear with ducktape
Wait for a new arm piece to be fabricated
The ducktape patch held up. You were able to reach the AMR Alpha 1. It was just stuck on a medium sized moon rock. Well now you have a real moon rock to take home with you to Earth.
By deciding to wait you chose safety before risk. The company understand but when they are on a deadline they feel to much time has been wasted.

A need for speed, huh. Think of the view you could have gotten by walking though. Your almost to AMR Alpha 1 and notice that there are small mounds in the path to the rover. With the low gravity on the moon going over the mounds at a high speed will mostly likely propel the rover upwards and off the surface for a few meters.
Go for style points! Full speed over the mounds
Take it slow over the mounds

Well your certainly would get the points if you were in an offroad race. Unfortunately for you landed on top of AMR Alpha 1. Destorying it beyond repair. The bosses won\'t be too happy with this news. Well it is time for you to think about changing your profession. Maybe give the new lunar offroad racing a try. I hear they are looking for experienced drivers.

They always said the turtle will always win the race. It\'s true again. Though probably less fun. You made it to AMR Alpha 1. Finding that is was just hindered by a medium sized moon rock and you can keep the moon rock as a reward.
